columns.description: A string containing the pair of barcode indices for which the following metrics apply, or a 0 if not barcoded. The barcode entries are represented as a pair of dash-separated number, with each number representing one of the two barcodes used for that amplicon.
The number of consensus sequences not categorized as Chimeric or Noise.
The percentage of consensus sequences not categorized as Chimeric or Noise.
The number of consensus sequences flagged as likely coming from PCR cross-over events.
The percentage of consensus sequences flagged as likely coming from PCR cross-over events.
The number of consensus sequences that have a very low predicted accuracy (<95%) despite sufficient coverage (>20 reads and >10% all sequences in the current bin) to be called an novel allele.
The percentage of consensus sequences that have a very low predicted accuracy (<95%) despite sufficient coverage (>20 reads and >10% all sequences in the current bin) to be called an novel allele.
